source: TEXT_DUNGEONMYC2_00000_MEESIYA_000_050<tab>At last... The power to reclaim what is mine. What is <var 1A 02 /var>ours<var 1A 01 /var>...
target:
TEXT_DUNGEONMYC2_00000_MEESIYA_000_050おお…… これが「女王の光輪」と呼ばれし ボズヤ･クリスタル……
今こそ 聖剣セイブ・ザ・クイーンの 真の力を解き放とうぞ……

source:
TEXT_DUNGEONMYC2_00000_MEESIYA_000_051The will of Queen Gunnhildr shall not be denied.
All who oppose Bozja must fall.
target:
TEXT_DUNGEONMYC2_00000_MEESIYA_000_051我 女王グンヒルドの遺志を継ぎ 聖剣とともに
ボズヤに仇なす者どもを 討ち滅ぼさん……

source: TEXT_DUNGEONMYC2_00000_MIKOTO_000_052<tab>By the gods... She has become a vessel for the blade's power!
target: TEXT_DUNGEONMYC2_00000_MIKOTO_000_052<tab>あれが真の闘神――  セイブ・ザ・クイーン！

source:
TEXT_DUNGEONMYC2_00000_MEESIYA_000_100No... No, we have suffered too long for it to end this way.
Bozja is ours! If we cannot have it, no one will!
target:
TEXT_DUNGEONMYC2_00000_MEESIYA_000_100馬鹿な…… 我が怨み…… 我が一族の怨みを晴らさねば……
憎きボズヤに 我が怒りの鉄槌をッ！！！
